hackathon-description-text: The focus of the series is to engage individuals/groups who have experience with AR/VR/MR and help them create their own mixed reality application with the Microsoft HoloLens.
hackathon-rules:
We will be following the 
.
"TL;DR.​ Be respectful. Harassment and abuse are never tolerated. If you are in a situation that makes you uncomfortable at an officially sanctioned MLH event, if the event itself is creating an unsafe or inappropriate environment, or if interacting with a MLH representative or event organizer makes you uncomfortable, please report it using the procedures included in this document"

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Up to 4 Unity Licenses for the team

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=255 Main St, Cambridge, MA 02142, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is it a new use case? An original design?
Gaze? Gesture? Voice? Spatial Mapping? Spatial Sound? Visual Indicators?
Custom shaders? Any technical issue they overcame?
How polished. UI features? Keep in mind though team size can affect this. Smaller teams are naturally at a disadvantage so balance that when judging this category
